text: Minced meat may refer to: * Ground meat, meat that has been minced or ground * Ground beef, a ground meat made of beef Minced meat may be confused with: * Mincemeat, a mixture of dried fruit and spices, commonly does not contain any meat * Operation Mincemeat, a British deception operation of the Second World War * Mint sauce, sauce made from finely chopped mint leaves, soaked in vinegar, and a small amount of sugar * Mince pie == See also == * Mince (disambiguation) * Keema
title: Minced meat
